ARABIC: قَٰلَ كَمْ لَبِثْتُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ عَدَدَ سِنِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He will say, 'How many years did you tarry on the earth?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They will be asked: "How long did you live on the earth in terms of years?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then Allah will ask them: "For how many years did you stay on earth?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God will ask them, "How many years did you live in your graves?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He will say, “How long did you stay on earth, counting by the number of years?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He will say: "What number of years did you stay on earth"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He will say: How many years did you tarry in the earth?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He shall say, 'How long have you tarried in the earth, by number of years?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He will say: How long tarried ye in the earth, counting by years?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He will ask, "How many years did you stay on earth?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He will say: how long tarried ye on the earth in number of year?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He will say, ‘How many years did you remain on earth?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He will say: "What number of years did ye stay on earth?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He (Allah) will say: "What number of years did you stay on earth?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And He will ask: 'How many years did you live on earth'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He will say, “How many years did you remain on earth?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Allah] will say, "How long did you remain on earth in number of years?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:112] He, exalted be He, will say, to them by the tongue of a Keeper [of Hell] (a variant reading [for qāla, ‘He will say’] has qul, ‘say’): ‘How long did you tarry in the earth, in this world and in your graves, in years?’ (‘adada sinīna is a specification).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He will say) Allah will say to them: (How long tarried you) how long have you remained (in the earth) in your graves, (counting by years) how many days and months?
